custom_preconds:

And an article page on the right side of the screen.

(Topmost article in index should load in the right side on launch of section.)

custom_steps_separated.content: In the news index on the left side of the screen.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
User should see drop down spinner where they can select individual team indexes.
User should see list of articles with:

Thumbnail image
Article headline
Article time and date in format: <HH:MM> <AM/PM>, <Day>, <Mon> <DD>

custom_steps_separated.content: If a thumbnail image is not available for a given article
custom_steps_separated.expected: There should be a MLB placeholder thumbnail

custom_steps_separated.content: When user swipes through article index
custom_steps_separated.expected: Placeholder thumbnails should appear as article thumbnail images are being loaded

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps the drop down spinner 
And the user selects a team from the list
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the spinner should show the selected team
And the news index for that team should load. 
And the first article in that team's news index should be selected and loaded in the section on the right.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has one or more favorite teams set in the app
And the user taps the drop down spinner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then their favorite team(s) will be listed under a "Favorite Teams" category
and this will be located under the "MLB" filter
and above the "Teams" category

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user changes the orientation of the device on the News index
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the orientation of the app should change from portrait to landscape or vice versa
And the user's scroll position in the article index should be maintained. 
And the selected article should be maintained

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on an article in the news index
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the news article should appear highlighted in the index
And the selected article should load in the section on the right.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user sends the app to the background (But does not kill the app)
And the user brings the app to the foreground
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the app should immediately update and any new articles should appear in the index.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the Share icon in the bottom right of the news article
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Android Share Menu should appear with the list of applications the user can share to.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the article has a video associated with it
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then at the top of the article the video should appear
And there should be an image
And there should be a play button.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the video in an article
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video should play
And when the video is done, the user should be returned to the article from which they launched the video

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user changes orientation of the device on an article page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the orientation should change from portrait to landscape and vice versa
And the layout of the article should still be readable.

custom_steps_separated.content: When there is an article that does NOT have an associated video
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should not see a blank video image
They should see the associated image

custom_steps_separated.content: When there is an article that does NOT have an associated image
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the article should load
And the article should not contain a blank space where the video should be. (There should be a placeholder image)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the article has player card tokens in the data
And the user taps on a player card link in the article
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the player card should open in an internal webview

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the article has a link to external content in the data
And the user taps on the link
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the link should open
